body_html:
The last thing my script does is closing the session, so I actually don't prevent it.

The info message appearing is okay.

Is it? Note that the problem is that sess.close() doesn't return because the thread could not be stopped (it does return thanks to the timeout).

The last thing my script does is closing the session, so I actually don't prevent it.

The info message appearing is okay.

Is it? Note that the problem is that sess.close() doesn't return because the thread could not be stopped (it does return thanks to the timeout).
body:
The last thing my script does is closing the session, so I actually don't prevent it.

> The info message appearing is okay.

Is it? Note that the problem is that sess.close() doesn't return because the thread could not be stopped (it does return thanks to the timeout).
